column1: Baby Barnaby's////Now for the food. I got the Green Eggs. Sorry
column2: but there aren't any green hams. This plate consists of two scrambled eggs mixed with pepper jack cheese
column4: and artichoke hearts. It also comes with toast and cajun styled potatoes. This is my most favorite dish and is without a doubt
column5: a must have. My second favorite is the Lox Platter. This has a bagel with cream cheese
column6: of which you spread to your liking
column7: and it is accompanied with smoked salmon
column10: and capers. It is also just as tasty. :) These plates are about $8 and $9
